snippet.title: Permafrost - New Trailer | FGS LIVE FROM GDC
snippet.description:
A brand new trailer for Permafrost, an apocalyptic open world survival game where players must embark on a brutal journey through a wilderness of perpetual winter. The game comes to PC later this year, and there's a free demo on Steam now.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #gdc #permafrost 

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
